bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXIX, 4705-4758. - I. Theological Texts (4705-4707). - II. New Literary Texts (4708-4714). - III. Known Literary Texts (4715-4738). - IV. Documentary Texts (4739-4758).
bibl.seg: GONIS N., D. OBBINK and D. COLOMO, G.B. D'ALESSIO, A. NODAR, with contributions by M. COTTIER, W.B. HENRY, M. HOMBERT †, N. LITINAS, C. LUZ, G. MASSIMILLA, D. MONTSERRAT †, J.D. THOMAS, J. YUAN, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXIX (Nos 4705-4758). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 89.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2005, 8°, xii-234 pp. et XVI pll. coul. ISBN 0-85698-143-5.
P. Oxy. LXIX, 4705-4758. - I. Theological Texts (4705-4707). - II. New Literary Texts (4708-4714). - III. Known Literary Texts (4715-4738). - IV. Documentary Texts (4739-4758).

C.R. par Silvia Barbantani, CR N.S., 57 (2007) pp. 64-67. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 79 (2007) pp. 310-314. - George M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 56 (2006) pp. 173-175 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXVIII]. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 82 (2007) Nos 163-164, pp. 342-347.
Gonis Obbink Colomo D'Alessio Nodar Cottier Henry Hombert Litinas Luz Massimilla Montserrat Thomas Yuan
